summary: An addition to the Open Cities mod by Arthmoor. This addes Ladders, Barrels and Crate to the cities to allow you to reach rooftops and other places you can't normally.
descriptionHtml:
An addition to the Open Cities mod by Arthmoor. This adds Ladders, Barrels and Crate to the cities to allow you to reach rooftops and other places you can't normally.

I played some Assassin's Creed: Black Flag on the weekend at a friends house. Whilst playing it I found my self just wanting to play my assassin/thief character in Skyrim instead. The one thing that was thoroughly enjoyable though was the parkour/freerunning.

So i've added some clutter to both Solitude and Riften to allow you to run along roof-tops and tried to interconnect them so that you don't have to touch the ground.

I like playing with the Skyrim Sewers 4 also. I really want to play as a thief/assassin in 3 levels of a city, under, in and over :)

Needed mods:
- Open Cities by Arthmoor

Suggested mods:
- Skyrim Sewers 4 (You will need the patched version of open cities)
author: Dev0lv0r
